response.original_title: School Idol Musical スクールアイドルミュージカル
response.overview: "Love Live! Series is a school idol project that develops all-media with the keyword ""A Story That Everyone Can Make Come True."""In addition to the music CD release with animated PV (DVD&BD) by school idols, we are also developing a variety of media including magazines and novels, TV animation, smartphone games, consumer games, trading card games, and live events.  It has been decided that the first musical production will be performed as a new work.This is not a musical version of the previous Love Live series, but a completely original new musical.Along with the newly written music for this work, we will deliver a youth school drama that will be fulfilled with 10 girls.  Fresh casts and experienced talented casts are gathered to embody the shining and hard work of high school girls who are making their dreams come true.Please look forward to it!
response.title: School Idol Musical スクールアイドルミュージカル
